content: Flamings will drop Flame Ores, which are an important item needed for a secret boss later on in the Chapter, so be sure to tackle each Flamling you find.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Flamings will drop Flame Ores, which are an important item needed for a secret boss later on in the Chapter, so be sure to tackle each Flamling you find.
